thread.title: Eddie Bauer Daisy Wrap
thread.title_full: Eddie Bauer Daisy Wrap - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jill K. Robinson
title: Eddie Bauer Daisy Wrap
text:
Photo: Eddie Bauer 8501223|article-6484475|7 8501223|article-6484475|1 email_share_embed|photo-8501223|article-6484475|1 8501223|article-6484475|2 8501223|article-6484475|3 8501223|article-6484475|4 8501223|article-6484475|5 google_share_embed|photo-8501223|article-6484475|6 Eddie Bauer Daisy Wrap Eddie Bauer Daisy Wrap
The best items of clothing for travel seem to contain a special magic: They can be worn over and over, paired with different outfits, and always work without people noticing that you’re wearing them multiple times. The Eddie Bauer Daisy Wrap fits into that category. The soft and lightweight wrap contains fabric that allows for some stretch, and also wicks moisture for comfort. The polyester/Tencel lyocell/spandex blend is wrinkle resistant, which means you can roll or fold it with abandon, as well as avoid the hotel room iron. It’s easy to toss in the washing machine or your hotel room sink, and dries relatively quickly. Wear it on city streets, to yoga class, out to dinner, on the airplane, or even as a beach cover-up, and you’re set. Eddie Bauer Daisy Wrap Eddie Bauer Daisy Wrap
